content: this legal document explains the progress of a cause involving a property located in castelfidardo on april 27 2007 a notary oversaw a process where the parties involved declared their ownership shares of the property the property consists of various parcels of land with a total value of €63053 the parties involved are identified as gg cf cgi and cga they agreed to terminate the existing coownership and divide the property into three shares gg retains the right to life usufruct of a specific portion of the land valued at €528120 cf retains the bare ownership of another portion valued at €2992680 cgi and cga retain joint undivided full ownership of the remaining portion valued at €27845 the document also mentions the balances owed to each party with gg entitled to €1573647 and cgi and cga entitled to €17856 these balances were paid by cf ggi gga and cga the document concludes by stating that the parties have received the balances and release any potential legal mortgage
